name: part_007
file: tmp_【 ＃百鬼あやめ生誕祭2023 】Nakiriayame 6th BirthDay  ～Shoot the heart～ [FOai83VIogA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Hona Appetite with S' (a parody of Blend S opening) by the unit 'Steal'.
Instrumental transition and visual effects showing Nakiri Ayame on a floating platform.
Solo performance of the song 'The Snow White Princess is' by Nakiri Ayame with holographic reflections.

subtitles.original: ぱっぱっ！

subtitles.english: We are Steal!!

subtitles.original: さあ 扉を開けて
subtitles.english: Now, open the door

subtitles.original: 愉快なパラダイス
subtitles.english: A pleasant paradise

subtitles.original: 怖がらずにおいで
subtitles.english: Come on in, don't be afraid

subtitles.original: おいで（おいで）

subtitles.english: With colors and

subtitles.original: Welcome to...
subtitles.english: Welcome to...

subtitles.original: わーい！ 私達と一緒に
subtitles.english: Yay! Along with us

subtitles.original: めくるめく ワンダーデイドリーム
subtitles.english: a dazzling wonder daydream

subtitles.original: 愛情マシマシ
subtitles.english: Extra serving of love

subtitles.original: 煩悩なでなで
subtitles.english: Petting your worldly desires

subtitles.original: 誠心誠意 つとめます
subtitles.english: We'll serve you with all our heart

subtitles.original: Yes! キミの元気チャージに
subtitles.english: Yes! To charge up your energy

subtitles.original: 一役買えるかな？
subtitles.english: I wonder if I can play a part?

subtitles.original: こーいった感じも
subtitles.english: This kind of feeling

subtitles.original: あーいった感じも
subtitles.english: That kind of feeling

subtitles.original: 意外と悪くないでしょ？
subtitles.english: Isn't it surprisingly not bad?

subtitles.original: Buono Buono ブレンドしたい
subtitles.english: Buono Buono, I want to blend

subtitles.original: キミに きゅん きゅん きゅん
subtitles.english: Throbbing for you

subtitles.original: ハートに ぱんち ぱんち ぱんち
subtitles.english: A punch to your heart

subtitles.original: Buono Buono ブレンドしたい
subtitles.english: Buono Buono, I want to blend

subtitles.original: お口に合いますか？
subtitles.english: Is it to your liking?

subtitles.original: お好み聞かせてね
subtitles.english: Tell me your preferences

subtitles.original: お口に合うといいな♪
subtitles.english: I hope it's to your liking

subtitles.original: 白い雪のプリンセスは
subtitles.english: The Snow White Princess is

subtitles.original: 鏡よ鏡よ鏡さん
subtitles.english: Mirror, mirror, oh mirror

subtitles.original: 世界で一番可愛いガールなの？
subtitles.english: Am I the cutest girl in the world?

subtitles.original: やめてよ 棘のような視線迫る
subtitles.english: Stop it, those thorn-like gazes are closing in

subtitles.original: 優しいフリした彼女が
subtitles.english: She, who pretended to be kind

subtitles.original: 素敵な晩餐 もてなした
subtitles.english: Served a wonderful dinner

subtitles.original: そっと口に含めば
subtitles.english: If I softly take a bite

subtitles.original: 笑み 薄れてゆく
subtitles.english: My smile begins to fade

subtitles.original: 意志の中で 夢を見てる
subtitles.english: I'm dreaming within my consciousness

subtitles.original: いつかのおとぎ話 時が止まる
subtitles.english: Like a fairy tale from long ago, time stops

subtitles.original: お願い KISS で目を醒まして欲しいの
subtitles.english: Please, I want you to wake me up with a KISS

subtitles.original: 白い棺から 連れ出すように
subtitles.english: As if taking me out from the white coffin

subtitles.original: 突き刺さる憎しみは ドラマ的な事情
subtitles.english: The piercing hatred is a dramatic circumstance

subtitles.original: 祈っても 王子様はまだ来ない
subtitles.english: Even if I pray, the prince hasn't come yet

subtitles.original: 鏡よ鏡よ鏡さん
subtitles.english: Mirror, mirror, oh mirror

subtitles.original: ネクタイ任せや 頬に合図するから
subtitles.english: I'll leave it to the tie or signal on my cheek

subtitles.original: ねたみを買われてしまった
subtitles.english: I ended up being envied

subtitles.original: 七人の小人はいるけど
subtitles.english: The seven dwarfs are here, but

subtitles.original: 助ける素振りしらんぷり
subtitles.english: They feign ignorance of helping me

subtitles.original: そっと首を掴まれ
subtitles.english: My neck is softly grabbed

subtitles.original: 笑み ひと粒の
subtitles.english: A single drop of a smile

subtitles.original: 涙さえも 拭えなくて
subtitles.english: I can't even wipe away my tears

subtitles.original: 呼吸もままならない 視界 伏せた
subtitles.english: I can't even breathe properly, my vision darkened

subtitles.original: 消えそうだから 早く駆けて欲しいの
subtitles.english: Because I'm about to disappear, I want you to run to me quickly

subtitles.original: 訳は聞かないで 応えられない
subtitles.english: Don't ask why, I can't answer

subtitles.original: 望まない憎まれ 深い愛の二乗
subtitles.english: Unwanted hatred, deep love squared

subtitles.original: もうすぐで いなくなるのかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if I'll be gone soon

subtitles.original: 途切れてく 命の音
subtitles.english: The sound of life is breaking off

subtitles.original: 毒リンゴを食した 少女のように
subtitles.english: Like the girl who ate the poisoned apple

subtitles.original: 眠りにつく
subtitles.english: I fall into a slumber

subtitles.original: お願い KISS で目を醒まして欲しいの
subtitles.english: Please, I want you to wake me up with a KISS

subtitles.original: 胸の中の声 届きますか？
subtitles.english: Can the voice inside my chest reach you?

subtitles.original: 階段を登ったら ドアを開けるだけで
subtitles.english: If you climb the stairs, just open the door
